summary: Many federal agencies have specialized law enforcement teams trained and equipped for critical incidents such as hostage rescue. This report describes these federal tactical teams, including their deployments and equipment. We identified 25 teams within the Departments of Homeland Security, Justice, and elsewhere. Deployments per team from FY 2015-19 ranged from 0 to over 5,000. Sixteen teams reported deployments related to nationwide civil unrest and...
title: Federal Tactical Teams: Characteristics, Training, Deployments, and Inventory
